data.eml:eml: Leaf-litter thrips of the genus Adraneothrips from Asia and Australia (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dang, Li-Hong, Mound, Laurence A., Qiao, Ge-Xia (2013): Leaf-litter thrips of the genus Adraneothrips from Asia and Australia (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripinae). Zootaxa 3716 (1): 1-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.1.1
